favourite.article: Very comprehensive song. I got help to find out the number on hymn book: 1195.

Hi David, I do not know if this portion is in any publications yet but the recording of brother Lee's speaking was played in Message 5 "Being Saved in Life & Reigning in Life for the Body Life" of the Winter Training in 2009 on the Crystalization-Study of the Gospel of God in the Book of Romans. You can sign up for a free account on www.lsmwebcast.com and purchase the message for $1.
Amen. What a revelation and experience of life. Who knows what book this is from? I heard that this is what brother Lee shared in the 70's after his illness on a wheel chair of a recorded message.
Life is mysterious, life is God Himself!

This hymn is very rich and full of revelation, praise GOD for this LIFE!! LIFE is always been GOD'S intention for man, and this precious LIFE is also HIS goal for man. HE went through a marvelous process to deliver this LIFE to us. AMEN.
